Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Citadines Maine Montparnasse Paris, you'll be centrally located in Paris, steps from Bobino and minutes from Tour Montparnasse. This residence is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Louvre Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 individually decorated guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones and safes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Citadines Maine Montparnasse Paris, you'll be centrally located in Paris, steps from Bobino and minutes from Tour Montparnasse. This residence is close to Notre Dame Cathedral and Louvre Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bobino - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Tour Montparnasse - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Place de Catalogne - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of Montparnasse - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bourdelle Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cartier Foundation for Contemporary Art - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Place Vavin - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Pasteur Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Place Denfert-Rocherau - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Paris Catacombs - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Paris Observatory - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Le Bon Marche - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Musee du Luxembourg - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Luxembourg Palace - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Citadines Maine Montparnasse Paris is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
